data.title: 5G Services Delivered by Our Partners
data.meta_description: Cradlepoint works with network operators across the globe to ensure our products deliver a best-in-class Wireless WAN experience for our customers.
data.text:
Always Connect Solutions is dedicated to removing the complexity in deploying 5G and 4G internet connectivity when and where you need it. We are a leader in the industry and provide a collaborative and consultive approach to understanding your needs and requirements. We take pride in going above and beyond for our customers to provide out of the box connectivity for any solution large or small, in ANY industry. We are here to ensure you and your solution, are Always Connected.

We help family, friends and neighbors connect in meaningful ways every day. From the first phone call 140+ years ago to mobile video streaming, we @ATT innovate to improve lives. We’re now the Nation’s Best 5G Network, according to the biggest test in the nation, which is run by Global Wireless Solutions* and spans all 50 states. AT&T Communications is part of AT&T Inc. (NYSE:T). For more information, please visit us at att.com.

*AT&T awarded Best 5G Network by GWS OneScore 2021. GWS conducts paid drive tests for AT&T and uses the data in its OneScore analysis. AT&T 5G requires compatible plan and device. 5G not available everywhere. Go to att.com/5Gforyou for details

CDW leading multi-brand provider of information technology solutions to business, government, education and healthcare customers in the United States, the United Kingdom and Canada. A Fortune 500 company and member of the S&P 500 Index, CDW was founded in 1984 and employs over 10,500 coworkers. For the trailing twelve months ended June 30, 2021, the company generated Net sales of approximately $20 billion. Our broad array of products and services range from hardware and software to integrated IT solutions such as security, cloud, hybrid infrastructure and digital experience.

Founded in 1978, Computer Solutions is a leading provider of complex technology products and services throughout the South Texas region. Headquartered in San Antonio, Texas we built our reputation by forging long-term relationships with our customers through broad technology expertise combined with a wealth of industry-based knowledge. Our industry experience and strong strategic alliances with manufacturer partners enable us to deliver sophisticated, information technology-based business solutions spanning a wide range of industries, with the performance, reliability, and scalability we know growth-oriented companies demand.

Lumen Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: LUMN) is guided by our belief that humanity is at its best when technology advances the way we live and work. With approximately 450,000 route fiber miles and serving customers in more than 60 countries, we deliver the fastest, most secure platform for applications and data to help businesses, government, and communities deliver amazing experiences.

Mettel is the simple, smart solution to all your telecom needs. We have created a supernetwork with advanced services that increases your productivity, empowers your workforce and improves operational efficiency with cost advantages you can’t get elsewhere. We make it easy to upgrade, integrate and onboard with no downtime.

Our business connections result in products and services that are the perfect solution for our clients, always at the best price. We offer a wide range of devices and services from telecom infrastructure planning to consolidated billing to transparent cloud-based management capabilities.

Presidio is a Digital Systems Integrator providing customers secure cloud environments that form the backbone of digital transformation. Presidio enables organizations to create an agile, secure infrastructure by delivering solutions that have the base of top-tier manufacturers.

We guide our customers from initial assessments, strategy and consulting — to implementation and deployment — to managed services that run IT for you, topped off with a suite of flexible financing and consumption options to simplify procurement. Our services experts are thinkers AND doers focused on accelerating business outcomes for customers in all industries.

Presidio is a leader in designing and implementing solutions that span technologies. We are a company of top engineers who are certified and experienced in building out solutions that deliver. With offices and consultants around the globe, your next world-class solution is never far away.

We believe staying connected is everything and use our expertise to help our customers reap the benefits of connectivity throughout their organization. RCN Technologies is a 5G & LTE enablement specialist, focusing on providing the right network-connected solution for the customer every time. Customers can #ExpectMore value from our consulting expertise, solution engineering, and Tier 1-3 support. We also provide industry-best pricing for all hardware and value-added services, including pre-deployment services, nationwide deployment, advanced post-sales support, and numerous field and integration needs. RCN Technologies has over 110 years of wireless industry experience, the most cellular-enabled hardware certifications in the industry, and the best service and support team. We are leading the pack in 5G specialization with Cradlepoint, an in-house 5G Lab, a 5G Task Force, and a 5G mmWave Lab research partnership with a major university. The customer will always win with RCN.

ROK Brothers Inc. provides specialized solutions for each customer. Customer support needs are taken care of before, during and after our solutions are put into place. We come armed with hands on experience, technical know-how and multi-functional expertise. We’re constantly striving to create a reliable and trustworthy experience for our customers through business expertise and industry knowledge.

In a world where businesses and organizations continue to struggle to keep up with technology, SimpleCom steps in to help. Providing practical, real-world solutions, SimpleCom has served over a thousand clients, by simplifying their fixed and mobile communication challenges. Working with partners and customers to make sure they have the solution that is the right fit – both technically and financially, SimpleCom’s team of engineers and project managers completely manage and oversee their customer’s deployment through planning and scheduling, hardware and software provisioning, on-site installation and after-sale support. For over two decades SimpleCom’s philosophy that “form follows function” has allowed them to become a leader in the information technology industry.

Source Inc. is a globally recognized wireless service integrator in the industry. We help your business gain and maintain a competitive advantage by implementing the technology essential to the success of your project. Our end-to-end solutions and managed service offerings are designed specifically to meet your needs. We take complex integrations and simplify the experience from employee-operated devices to, design, installation, and management of your IoT and Wireless Infrastructure. Nationwide 5G enables a plethora of robust options to support a wide range of business functions from mobile workforces to remote operations. A successful project starts with the right solutions partner and a powerful 5G device that meets your business needs today and beyond. Source Inc. brings the necessary experience and resources to provide your business with a turn-key industry-leading wireless solution.

When you choose STEP CG, you get a trusted partner that understands your business strategy. We’re a leading managed IT, security and cloud services provider with award-winning, nationwide solutions. We support a full portfolio of networking, voice, security and professional service solutions. Our network technology solutions are powered by strategic engineers and best of breed technologies across a wide range of industries. STEP CG provides solutions that are optimized for business efficiency and agility. We work diligently to ensure your IT environment is as secure, agile and resilient as the spirit of your business. Plus, our engineers have the highest certifications from the world-class technology vendors you know and love.

Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE, Nasdaq: VZ) was formed on June 30, 2000 and is one of the world’s leading providers of technology, communications, information and entertainment products and services. Headquartered in New York City and with a presence around the world, Verizon generated revenues of $128.3 billion in 2020. The company offers voice, data and video services and solutions on its award-winning networks and platforms, delivering on customers’ demand for mobility, reliable network connectivity, security and control.

As the Balticad team we specialize in sales and technical consulting of integration with LTE / 5G routers, antennas, server systems and industrial memory. Our work with customers based on solution projects, which are going through all stages of implementation from the selection of appropriate solutions to the realisation of the order and providing each type of services.

Blue Wireless specializes in Cradlepoint SD-WAN Edge Equipment, the global leader in 5G and 4G/LTE enterprise solutions. Designed around wireless connectivity with business in mind, it provides the reliability and features which branch locations and remote sites require. Blue Wireless is Global Elite partner of Cradlepoint with extensive experience in deployment and management and was awarded APAC Partner of the year twice in a row in 2019 and 2020.

CDW leading multi-brand provider of information technology solutions to business, government, education and healthcare customers in the United States, the United Kingdom and Canada. A Fortune 500 company and member of the S&P 500 Index, CDW was founded in 1984 and employs over 10,500 coworkers. For the trailing twelve months ended June 30, 2021, the company generated Net sales of approximately $20 billion. Our broad array of products and services range from hardware and software to integrated IT solutions such as security, cloud, hybrid infrastructure and digital experience.

KFP specialise in providing in-store retail IT systems, services, solutions, project management & support platforms throughout Europe. With over 20 years’ experience, we work with some of the biggest household brand names on the high street in the retail & hospitality sectors, building close working & long-standing partnerships built on trust, expertise, and a mindset to getting the job done. Operating from our HQ in Abingdon, Oxfordshire, UK & our satellite locations in Dublin, Ireland & Utrecht, The Netherlands we can support our client’s retail estates across UK, Europe and beyond.

UK Connect is the leading provider of Connectivity & I.T solutions to the UK Construction sector. Using the latest cutting-edge Wireless 4TH & 5TH generation networks, a commitment to install quality, service and ongoing support, we connect over 1000 construction sites every year. Our experience extends beyond construction to offer bespoke connectivity and network solutions to UK government agencies including The Ministry of Defence and Met Office. We are incredibly proud that such highly regarded organisation choose us as their partner of choice, which we feel reflects our passion and commitment to what we do.

Novotech is one of the largest IoT distributors in North America with a strong presence in Canada. They are the #1 distributor to utilities and first responders and deep relationships in the government, industrial and commercial sectors. As Cradlepoint’s first 5G Certified partner in Canada, Novotech has all the experience and facilities to handle the massive potential of 5G.

Blue Wireless specializes in Cradlepoint SD-WAN Edge Equipment, the global leader in 5G and 4G/LTE enterprise solutions. Designed around wireless connectivity with business in mind, it provides the reliability and features which branch locations and remote sites require. Blue Wireless is Global Elite partner of Cradlepoint with extensive experience in deployment and management and was awarded APAC Partner of the year twice in a row in 2019 and 2020.

At Optus, we’re passionate about creating compelling customer and employee experiences, and bringing to life the spaces and things that make this possible.

It’s about empowering our customers to thrive in an age of unprecedented digital disruption. And it’s why Optus is trusted by thousands of Australian organizations who value a partner that understands the full breadth of managed technology and services – from applications, security, cloud-led ICT, to collaboration and contact centers. All underpinned by our smart and secure network.

Telstra is a leading telecommunications and information services company. It offers a full range of services and compete in all telecommunications markets in Australia, operating the largest mobile and Wi-Fi networks. Under the partnership with Cradlepoint, Telstra will tap into Cradlepoint’s deep enterprise cellular expertise and NetCloud platform to collaborate on the development of an integrated 5G modem and edge router solution that works seamlessly with its 5G mobile technology.

wevo specializes in wireless 4G/LTE solutions for both primary and failover access networks and was one of the first companies certified in Australia to offer managed business grade 5G solutions to ensure businesses can benefit from the leap in wireless technology. A recipient of the award for Cradlepoint Emerging Partner of the Year 2020 in APAC, the wevo and Cradlepoint partnership delivers WWANs that enable connectivity to people, places, and things anywhere with greater simplicity, agility, and security.
